....damn it...I fell like..well even though I never fuckin saw Christine when she was down here I can feel the miles between us like japanese toture I can't belive that I've actually come to loosing her..I've cried soo much..not any mroe than in the past..but this pain is all so different..not hurt of a mistake or somthing that I've done to cause us to not be together..but sometyhing..so...out of my control I had no choice but to let her go..damn now the love of my life lives in one corner  of the us and my lover lives in another ahhhhhhhh!!!!!???? talk about being alone? right?..I'm uhh g2r..

 

Broken
http://bleedbrokensoul.livejournal.com/8309.html

I find myself lost in the noise of her packing..I can't belive it actually came..so many other things that she said she would do never got done...why does she have to go threw with moving..I can't cry on the out side any more..my face is numb to the cold... so I choke it down..and as the knot starts to ease I know it has to be because I am crying yet I feel nothing..it's like I am slowly being ripped apart..but the only pain you feel is the worst..the beginning...as I consciously try to let go and slip back to the world I know now...I realize that I am bleeding..not that any one can see..because once again all is lost on the outside..so what now? I ask myself? you have this new life..new things..new options.. I find my self at the end of my wits...I don't know what to do any more..I thought that I was past this..I thought that I had learned how to let go..yet once again I face someone I love leaving me and I can't quite grasp the reality of the matter..ohh what to do what to do..ohh I know over whelm myself..like one of those married women who knows that their husband is having an affair and choose to ignore it... c'mon lets get real now..when you learn to let go of so much..you can only grasp what little you know..I let go of our future I let go of  (most of) our past..I let go of our corrupted relationship..but how do I let go of her? espically when I let go of everything else for her??..I hadn't been on here in soo long I forgot my pass word..and so I had em' send it to me..***news flash** it was Never Stop... (of course now I'll change it) and it ment never stop trying and never give up..and never stop loving her...she told me August 24 that she was moving..and I cried even then..but I chose to look on the bright side... and I figured that well don't look at it like I'm loosing her in 5 months look at it as...you have five months to make her fall madly in love with you..and not leave... the only thing is..I think I suceeded in more ways than one..I managed to make her love me..have guilt about it..and I managed to fall in love with her too..again..and have a guilt trip cause I love someone else as well....so my reality bends..and I give in to the fact that I can't win...and that my one is going to leave me.. and as the tears soak my pillow..and the sobs get louder...I realize this time...she's not here to hold me and tell me how it'll be ok.. so this is it I've reached my end..I've lost myself..and I cried a river litterally..so you tell me what comes next....

 

Always and Forever,

I need mucho helpo... I can't seem to get a fix on whats up w/ Christine... Ok all of you know...on one knows Christine better than Jen does..well... I know that us not being together is getting to her..and one thing that Christine does best is lets people think that it's not getting to her..she refuses to let you know that she needs you...so in the mean time...I think that she is pushing me away so that I don't think that this is hurting her...but then she slips and calls one day and says she misses me..and I still want us soo bad so I am trying everything to still see her..and Manage to make us float.. it ain't flyin... then she tells me she dosen't want me to move on.. and personally I already know that I can't do that I am not ready..and not for a long while will be...but in the mean time..I spill my guts to her..tell her how  love her and I still want us and I'm not going any where...I can't..and I get a silent streak...she says nothing..then mnages to get mad at me..then we went our whole first day with out talking since we met..that hurt so fuckin bad..I don't even know why..I mean yeah I could have prevented it..I could have been the one to call but considering the facts..and that I spilled my guts..to get a no responce..it did't seem she cared..nor that I should call her...ok then here comes the big mind twister of all..last night I go to see her..and I gave her friend Amber a hug and amber like pressed my body soo close to hers..it was great..lol..then she looked at christine and was like yeah cause I can do that now...?? and ohhh fricken man Christine looked soo deeply PISSED! I loved it on some level it showed that she still wants me to be hers and no one can touch me...then when I went to leave she hugged me..and grabbed my tit??? ok soo now what..I go home and antisipate her call AGAIN!!!! and I just don't know guys...I mean I still have to much of a grip to just let go..but at the same time...do I bring this to her attention? or just kinda let this ash continue to blow to NOTHINGNESS!!??? ok well advice mucho fasto..ttyal

I can't even bare to think any more..its soo annoying to think it's actually over?? not to mention the thought alone has been slowly escaping to the back of my mind so I don't have to comprehend whats actually going on..I think to much as it is...but when I don't think the pain just builds..I always had thoes convincing thoughts that I would tell my self I caould never Imagine  me saying that I don't really talk to Christine any more..and I I now have to accept that.. I miss her...Maybe not necessarly being with her..but I miss talking to her she dosen't even call any more...maybe the break up wasn't as mutual as I like to think..cause it seems to be bothering me alittle more than others..and I haven't figured out why!!!! I mean I knew it was comming I was trying to save it..and its not that it was even wasted effort..cause I love her...it's just..like I said reality that things are over..and maybe we wern't ment to be together forever but thats the way it was planned in my head..maybe not kids.and mybe not washington..but I had been antisipating our apartment for longer than I can rember..and I used to drive past apartment complexes..and think..."yeah we could live there some day"...now It hurts to even attempt to look..I hate that I wantched my future turn to ash...and all I can do is watch it blow away now..I am soo sick of this feeling..I wisht that I could be in school with PEOPLE.and not always thinking about this damn situation...sometimes I wonder if it was even love..or at elast I used to I used to wonder..if we were only with eachother because it was convient...or beacuse we thought that one loved the other as much as the other thought...but no..it wasn't convience..look at all the bullshit we had to over some..and go around just to exzist..and it wasn't that I stayed with her cause she loved me..it's nnot hard to love some one..it was gthat I was actually in love with the dumb bitch...while she crushed on a woman half our age..I was thinking I wonder what my baby is doing...wel i guess now I know..and even that dosent really bother me cause I thuoght that she loved me..but...if she really did I think that she would still call as I do her... gotta go  back to work ttyal

One sunny day in 2005 an old man approached the White House from across Pennsylvania Avenue, where he'd been sitting on a park bench.

He spoke to the U. S. Marine standing guard and said, "I would like to go in and meet with President Bush."

The Marine looked at the man and said, "Sir, Mr. Bush is no longer president and no longer resides here."

The old man said, "Okay," and walked away.

The following day, the same man approached the White House and said to the same Marine, "I would like to go in and meet with President Bush." The Marine again told the man, "Sir, Mr. Bush is no longer president and no longer resides here."

The man thanked him and, again, just walked away.

The third day, the same man approached the White House and spoke to the very same U. S. Marine, saying, "I would like to go in and meet with President Bush."

The Marine, understandably agitated at this point, looked at the man and said, "Sir, this is the third day in a row you have been here asking to speak to Mr. Bush. I've told you already that Mr. Bush is no longer the president and no longer resides here. Don't you understand?"

The old man looked at the Marine and said, "Oh, I understand. I just love hearing it."

The Marine snapped to attention, saluted, and said, "See you tomorrow."

 

This is for you Mandi and your stoopid bush Jokes..see I am not the only one who dislikes him!! and my joke is better!

Alot of People believe in Love but they don't belive in MAGIC? I honestly don't see much of a difference...I think that love is nothing but a trick on the mind..something that you force your self to believe is there.....Until you finally realize you've been fooling your self for the last couple of months..But if there is one thing about  love that I have noticed to be real..It's the power that one person can hold over another with out them even knowing the grasp is there...I mean...it's like the disappearing act really cause just when you think that its you that finally have a hold on them...You blink and your force disappears..And they suddenly have you back under their curtain? I don't know..I'm the one under the curtain..alwayas wondering what trick is next..and what form I take to the audience next...Yet I can never  see the hold that she has on me...Like I force myself to believe that it's not there...When deep down..I know I am just fooling myself..How do we let things get this way? I mean c'mon..really?? And how do we prevent it? I don't think that any one can..And there will always be the one person who has more power over the other..But..It is all up to you whether your the rabbit outta the hat..Or whether your the one grasping the rabbit...

"I am toatly bugged" a really good friend of mine would use that termnology right about now to describe how I feel... I know in this Journal..most of you have gotten to know me as this crazed obssed lesbain who is horribly in love with her spouse....truth be told yes I love my g/f horribly..it's just somethings come to terms when you think about it long enough..and I don't talk about it in here..but there is mad unfairness in my relationship...that I have slowly chose to neglect over time...and I noticed not confronting the sitation has made it worse...I have feelings for some one else..my g/f really isn't there..and..I found out that feelings are just as misleading as words..we all know I made a mistake.you read in prior entries..I just..I can't express to that person enough to get it threw to them that I know that..and the consequesnes wern't worth the actions..I just can't do it..I can't fix it..I fucked up to the point where I am not even allowed in any more.. and I know it's my fault..which buggs me even more..but..this over whelming crushed feeling is so hard to deal with..and knowing I did this.I cause it..to more than my self..makes it 10 times worse......and it's taking forever for me to understand that I ca't fix it.. Because I always had that oppertunity with friends and lovers..I fucked up...don't do it again...RIGHT? nope nope.don't always go that way....I don't know..I just feel so toatly mislead by words once again..I feel so damn gulliable when it comes to feeling like this..but I know it was there..and even more..I know.or I want to know that it still is..but I can't....I am making no sence so I am going to gohang with my pal for the night..since I don't see the outside any more...

**mandi**

I know that you've said beofe that you felt like you sabotaged my relatioship with christine a long time ago..and I know you've seen the movie secret window..well it's kinda like that..you can't ruin something that is't there..I guess thats why I am so willing to leave it...but I am doing it with or with out you..and accepting my aloneness

WTF do I say to that..ok well it's ok I mean I did't want to see you either...and..I wouldn't go there either...even if you had wanted me to...???? whateva....I guess when it's my turn to jump..I'll sit onmy ass..and tell some one else no...

I have been trying to figure out whats wrong with my lovely girlfirend..since last saturday..I thought that perhaps she had cheated..found another love..or hell simply fell outta love with me..I did't know but I had been wonder and questioning myself as to the matter for the last week..it's pracitly driven me insane..or to a small point of depression....I felt the need to cry all week for no apparent reason..and I did't know what I had done..or why my girlfriend did't want to talk to me..last night..at about 12 in the morning..when she conviently got off work..she called..said goodnight.and once again..talked to me for about 5 sec. and let me go.. still not quiet having nerve to say any thing I let her go... I had anticipated leaving her from my horrible thoughts..but..at about 2 she tried to cal me again..and go figure Jen answers as always..she tells me that "we need to talk"....(oh great here it comes) she said that she felt as though she was in an 8th grade relatioship..I am not sure how that feels or how it is even relevent to our relationship..but..thats what I was told..I can't help but wonder who's relationship she was using as an example to put ours down on such a level of inmaturity..now..I my self am a very immature person..for thoes of you whom know Christine as well as I do (which isn't most) she's even worse than me when you catch her alone....so I don't know I guess in alot of aspects because of who we are our relatioship is going to be immature..but on so many levels we surpass even our maturity level..in veriouse ways..it's just unimaginable that she would even consider "our" relationship...8th gradeish.and I am not even sure if immature and petty is what she ment by it..but..I told her how I was feeling and what I thought had been going on...and she asked my why I never said any thing..well for one.I never talk to her long enough to even mention it..and second..for those of you who know me pretty well..I'm not to good with letting people know how I feel..I will kinda go around it.or hint at it if I actually want them to know bad enough..but..any way...she called me this morning..at work..and I told her that I don't concider our relationship...8th grade level..and I asked her why she did..and I guess it's just one of those things that you feel better after saying..cause she said that she did't..well... we all know.... how that goes I guess...but I don't know where she thought that not talking to me as much was going to make our relationship..any less..immature..but hey I guess thats her perogative...

**any way**
